## isCaseNode() function

Type guard to determine if an object is a ContractCase matcher descriptor or not

**Signature:**

```typescript
isCaseNode: (maybeMatcher: unknown) => maybeMatcher is AnyCaseMatcher
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

maybeMatcher is AnyCaseMatcher

true if `maybeMatcher` is a matcher descriptor, false if not
